categories: Category:Ships of the Open Circle Fleet

nodes.text: Even Piell's cruiser was a Venator-class Star Destroyer that served as the flagship of Jedi General Even Piell and Captain Wilhuff Tarkin.

This Venator-class Star Destroyer fell under attack from Separatist forces sometime around 21 BBY, while returning from a mission in the Outer Rim with valuable information concerning the Nexus Route stored in its onboard computers. Commanding the cruiser were Jedi Master Even Piell and Captain Wilhuff Tarkin, and, when their ship was boarded, they were taken prisoner along with the ship's deck officers and sent to the Citadel to be tortured for information. The cruiser came under heavy fire during the confrontation.
